These are also, for example, legal, economical, organizational and operational entities that are normally part of stakeholder requirements and concerns. 4) Organize, assess and control evolution of the architecture models and views to help ensure that the architectural intent is met and the architectural vision and key concepts are correctly implemented. 5) Maintain the architecture definition and evaluation strategy.
